about_the_game:
Game Overview

Pretty, gentle, virtuous, and all the qualities that make you "marriageable", but is that the case? In the game, you will be a marriage scammer, manoeuvring between three men to gain money through love. It's up to you to decide whether you want to be alone, or whether you want to fall in love.

Game Information

Genre: Female-oriented Romance ADV
Playable Characters: 3
Number of endings: 4 endings for each character
※This game contains some BDSM tendencies and depictions of female dominance, so please be aware of that.

Sharing Regulations

The entire contents of the game can be shared.
When sharing, be sure to mention the name of the game and the link to this store page if you can.

name: Miss Mantis 螳螂小姐

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz 或 AMD A10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas lícitas
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: It is a female-perspective romance visual novel, in which you will play a marriage fraudster who is trapped between three different men, and it's up to you to decide whether you want to put your interests first or fall in love.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
